headline: Prudential, Dimensional Fund Advisors and FIDx Collaborate to Help Reinvent Retirement Income in Wealth Management
summary: NEWARK, N.J., January 14, 2025--Prudential Financial, Inc. (NYSE: PRU) today announced plans to collaborate with Dimensional Fund Advisors and Fiduciary Exchange LLC (FIDx) to bring protected lifetime income strategies to managed accounts via the FIDx Insurance Overlay marketplace. This initiative is designed to further meet the evolving needs of retirement investors who partner with registered investment advisors (RIAs), in a new, innovative way.
